p.k: Northern Thailand is world reknown for delicious Jasmine rice and 5 alarm fire spicy Thai chilis. But in one remote area there is a village that is famous for a completely different reason. We traveled these back roads of these farming communities in search of this one small, very unique and unusual village. A village where everyone owns an unusual pet. Even the children here use these pets as playmates. Come with us to explore... The King Cobra Village and the "Year of the Snake".
